subject: This Week on CBS SportsLine: Drop the puck already!
body:
This Week on CBS SportsLine - a weekly programming guide





 






 



May 28-June 3, 2007






 
 
 
 







 



This programming guide is updated throughout the week. Click here to see the latest version






 


 


 



Drop the puck already!
Drop the puck already! Goaltender Ray Emery is a key for the Senators. (AP)


    

      After a long wait, particularly in Ottawa, the Senators and Ducks get 
      down to deciding the Stanley Cup champion Monday in Anaheim. Wes 
      Goldstein will be there, and for games Wednesday and Saturday, too. • Ten 
      things:  Senators 
      | Ducks 
      | Matchups 
      | Experts 
      |  Goldstein
 






 

 





 This week: French Open gets down and dirty


    

      
      The season's second Grand Slam event is under way on the clay courts at 
      Roland Garros in Paris. Biggest question: Can Rafael Nadal (pictured) make 
      it three in a row, or will someone -- Roger Federer? -- stop 
      him?
